mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, album_template_id AS albumTemplateId, photo_config_name AS photoConfigName, photo_desc AS photoDesc, photo_width AS photoWidth, photo_height AS photoHeight, created_by AS createdBy, created_date AS createdDate, last_modified_by AS lastModifiedBy, last_modified_date AS lastModifiedDate, is_del AS isDel FROM album_template_photo_config
(IS_DEL = 0 OR IS_DEL IS NULL) and album_template_id = #{albumTemplateId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
